extendedInfo.description: â¶ www.crackberry.com review: "Fancy a challenge? Guide Ulysses home with The Odyssey HD. If you are looking for a mystical adventure game then The Odyssey HD may well be just what you are after... If you fancy taking on the challenge of getting Ulysses home, you won't want to miss this game."â¶ www.pdasnews.com review: "Being a Lucas/Sierra addicted fan, I loved this game. It kept me playing for several hours each day and when I finished it (with tips of course) I wanted more. I totally recommend it to all the genre fans and all the other guys who are just bored playing 'hidden object' games."â¶ www.blackberryos.com review: "If you were born before the 90's, then you most likely are familiar with some old classic point and click adventure games. My all time favorite was the King's Quest series. This game will keep you entertained for hours on end. Beware, highly addicting!"This is the free / lite version. Its fully playable until its 3rd chapter completely free. Many hours of free adventure game playing guaranteed! No ads, try it for free!FEATURES:â¶ Huge and classic point-and-click adventure game.â¶ Be part of Homer's epic story and educate yourself while playing.â¶ Face ancient Gods, Sirens, Cyclops and other monsters.â¶ Beautifully hand drawn cartoons (Full HD), humorous dialogs and challenging puzzles.â¶ Short animation synopsis for educational purposes.â¶ Fully translated into English, German, French, Spanish, Russian and Greek.â¶ Auto adjustable for all android devices (both phones + tablets)â¶ Requires a device with hardware acceleration (OpenGL)Step into this epic point-and-click mythical adventure game. See what it takes to be the Greek hero Odysseus (Ulysses)! Get ready to embark on a journey filled with danger, mythical creatures and ancient Gods. Thrilling moments and unexpected twists as well as the evil presence of legendary creatures dominate this mythical game throughout.You will have to step into the shoes of Odysseus (Ulysses) and his journey home after the fall of Troy. It took him ten years to reach Ithaca after the ten- year Trojan War. Become a part of Homer's original myth, live the adventure, and educate yourself during the process.Beware; this is not a simple task. You will have to escape from Goddess Calypso's island, blind Cyclops Polyphemus, face the witch-Goddess Circe, go to the land of the death in search of an oracle, avoid the Siren mermaids, pass between the six-headed monster Scylla and the whirlpool Charybdis, and visit the Sun God's island. Finally, you will have to murder the suitors and get together with your beloved wife, Penelope and your fearless son Telemachus.

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Nice job. I love the puzzles. I beat the free levels, and can\'t wait for the paid version so I can continue. :-)

reviews.title: Needs more free levels
reviews.comment: Not worth installing, only one level
reviews.author: Renee Bell

reviews.comment: I really like this game. It is challenging, interesting, and has a lot of good info on mythology. The only things I was thinking of was being able to make useless items; it would make the levels more challenging, and the grammatical errors. GREAT JOB, CrazySoft :)\tSo..  :)
reviews.author: Annabeth Chase

reviews.title: I love this game!
reviews.comment: This game is so fun! It has a perfect range of obstacles. The art is also very refreshing with great detail. I recommend if you like Greek mythology and a good challenge that you should definately check it out.
reviews.author: Simone Mcgowan

reviews.comment: Good game but I dont get how to make the sail make a simpler way and you have a 5 from me

reviews.title: 4 stars
reviews.comment: questo gioco sa come far divertire
reviews.author: Moksh Sharma

reviews.title: Frustrating
reviews.comment: I don\'t think I\'m stupid; I\'ve competed a lot of these games without trouble. But I\'m stuck in the first scene with nowhere to go, apart from the beach and the entry of the cave, and nothing more I can click on. I\'d play more if there were hints...
reviews.author: Anna Andersen

reviews.title: Worst game ever
reviews.comment: I like the concept but they were not able to make it work. The clues are vague and unintuitive.  The english translation is terrible and progress is impossible don\'t waste your time or money on this crap. These developers should go back to school.schooled @
reviews.author: Anthony Lund

reviews.title: Boring
reviews.comment: I  hate to give a free game a poor rating, but I couldn\'t even last 10 minutes. Simplistic graphics and animations, verbose and grammatically poor exposition, awkward interface.
reviews.author: Dia Wong

reviews.title: Lots of fun
reviews.comment: Takes some time t with through the problem solving with very unclear goal setting capability,s ststill fun

reviews.title: Recommend it
reviews.comment: Perfect point and click adventure game. Very smart game with difficult puzzle games in it. Recommend it.
reviews.author: mtzo i

reviews.title: Lame
reviews.comment: What?! I stuck in the 1st scene. The arrow to enter of the cave cannot be clicked. It always said I did a wrong action.  Such a regrettable download!
reviews.author: Feriti Putrilisa

reviews.title: Can\'t Purchase Full Game
reviews.comment: Enjoy the game but unfortunately I\'m unable to find the full version to purchase. Have searched the playstore as well as tried purchasing through game. Bummer, that\'s why the 2 stars.  I live in the United States. Never had an issue purchasing through the playstore. Did I overlook a list of countries that aren\'t supported?  If so please direct me to them.
reviews.author: Myra M.

reviews.title: Mr Lund is right
reviews.comment: Apparrently they do need to go back to school,and learn some manners. You don\'t criticize customers that\'s business 101. You guys are  a bunch of jerks.
